attributes.action: end the 'trade swap' whereby we export goods only to import the same goods, wasting transport fuel and thereby harming the environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every week we (and all other free trade countries) engage in the 'trade swap' foolishness of exporting goods produced in the UK only to import the same goods. Please stop this - lets just keep what we need here and import any extra as needed.
